name: karma-electron
description: Karma launcher and framework for Electron

scripts.test: npm run test-karma-all && npm run lint
scripts.test-karma-all: npm run test-karma-single-run && npm run test-karma-failure && npm run test-karma-uncaught-exception && npm run test-karma-karma
scripts.test-karma-karma-comment: # DEV: We run `test-karma-karma` twice to verify no user-data-dir is leaking
scripts.test-karma-karma: cross-env TEST_TYPE=KARMA karma start test/integration-test/karma.conf.js --single-run && cross-env TEST_TYPE=KARMA karma start test/integration-test/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test-karma-failure: node bin/verify-failure.js TEST_TYPE=FAILURE karma start test/integration-test/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test-karma-uncaught-exception: node bin/verify-failure.js TEST_TYPE=UNCAUGHT_EXCEPTION karma start test/integration-test/karma.conf.js --single-run
